hello.intro: Spring in Ocala brings the WEC Ocala Spring 1 into full stride from March 25-29, 2026, with early week schooling days stepping into weekend main events. At the World Equestrian Center (WEC), the grounds stay busy as spectators and riders circulate between rings. Stadium settings under lights, barn rows in motion, and steady concourses create a festive energy that reflects the season's bright at this venue. Outside the gates Ocala FL remains close, with tree-lined roads and quiet green spaces around the complex.
hello.transition: As the cadence of schooling and ring rounds settles into pattern, the week takes on a steady rhythm. The sections that follow guide readers into the quier parts of this experience, from sleep bases near the venue to simple places to eat and reset.
